text: "You" is a song by the American heavy metal band Queensrÿche. It was released as a single in support of their 1997 album Hear in the Now Frontier. == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1997) !Peak position |- | U.S. Billboard Mainstream Rock | style="text-align:center;"|11 |- |} == References == Category:1996 songs Category:1997 singles Category:Queensrÿche songs Category:EMI Records singles Category:Songs written by Chris DeGarmo Category:Songs written by Geoff Tate Category:Song recordings produced by Peter Collins (record producer) Category:American hard rock songs
title: You (Queensrÿche song)
